item1.FIELD3: Also known as potstickers. Japanese pork dumplings, steamed and seared until crisp, served with a tangy soy-based dipping sauce.

item2.FIELD3: A classic Japanese soup of fermented soy beans, served with wakame seaweed and diced silken tofu

item3.FIELD3: Flavorful soft boiled eggs with custard like egg yolk

item5.FIELD3: Japanese crabstick with mayonnaise resting on top of a cucumber slaw, topped with fresh shrimp roe or Japanese caviar

item6.FIELD3: An American classic with a Japanese twist. Teppanyaki beef with deep fried sweet onions topped with flame-torched cheese served with our own rolls dip

item7.FIELD3: Kani with fresh mango rolled with crunchy kani strips on top

item8.FIELD3: Combination of two sushi variants from choices of California roll, Philly Cheese Steak Roll, Crunchy Kani Roll, and Dynamite Roll

item9.FIELD3: Japanese sweet omelette, served with fresh daikon and wasabi

item10.FIELD3: Fresh Norwegian salmon, served with fresh daikon, pickled ginger and wasabi

item11.FIELD3: Fresh Norwegian salmon on top of vinegared rice, served with wasabi

item12.FIELD3: Ramen noodles served with chashu slices, aji, tamago, fish cake and wakame in shoyu soup base

item13.FIELD3: Traditional Japanese stew of sliced beef, silken tofu, shiitake mushrooms, vegetables, glass noodles and raw egg

item14.FIELD3: Stir fried beef slices topped with egg yolk, spring onions, black and white sesame seeds on sesame oil-drizzled ramen noodles in shoyu soup base

item15.FIELD3: Breaded pork cutlet, deep-fried and simmered in sweet soy sauce, onions and leeks, with beaten egg, topped on a bed of steamed Japanese rice

item16.FIELD3: Breaded shrimps deep-fried and simmered in sweet soy sauce, onions and shiitake mushroom strips with beaten egg topped on a bed of steamed Japanese rice.

item17.FIELD3: Beef bacon slices stir-fried with teppanyaki sauce and onion slices on a bed of steamed Japanese rice

item18.FIELD3: Premium diced-cut beef, perfectly served and stir-fried with garlic and teppanyaki sauce, served with a siding of savory sesame moyashi

item19.FIELD3: A modern Japanese dish of fresh asparagus spears wrapped in honey-glazed bacon strips seared to perfection

item20.FIELD3: Fillet of high quality tender pork, breaded and deep fried until golden brown. Served with cabbage salad and a drizzle of sesame dressing
